problems.title: Sum of Divisors of N
problems.description:
You are given a positive integer N. Let d1, d2, ..., dk be all positive divisors of N. Your task is to compute the sum d1 + d2 + ... + dk.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print a single integer, the sum of all positive divisors of N.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
12

Sample Output
28

Explanation:
Divisors of 12 are 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12 and their sum is 28.
hintsList: If n = p1^e1 * p2^e2 * ... then sum of divisors is product over i of (1 + pi + pi^2 + ... + pi^ei). Factorize n up to sqrt(n).
